item.title: Vim Setting
item.description: Vim 设置状态栏 "statusline 设置状态栏 set statusline= set statusline+=%7*\[%n] "buffernr set statusline+=%1*\ %<%F\ "文件路径 set statusline+=%2*\ %y\ "文件类型 set statusline+=%3*\ %{''.(&fenc!=''?&fenc:&enc).''} "编码1 set statusline+=%3*\ %{(&bomb?\",BOM\":\"\")}\ "编码2 set statusline+=%4*\ %{&ff}\ "文件系统(dos/
